abstract: In a surprise move, Warren G. Lichtenstein’s Steel Partners said it would nominate three candidates to the board of the Rowan Companies, an oilfield services company, to unlock more value.
lead_paragraph: In a surprise move, Warren G. Lichtenstein’s Steel Partners said it would nominate three candidates to the board of the Rowan Companies, an oilfield services company, to unlock more value.

headline.main: Lichtenstein Launches Proxy Battle With Rowan
